programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour 2024 will host the second stop of the freestyle discipline in Cauipe in north-eastern Brazil. The Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup offers intense competitions in the shallow waters.

programme.title: Episode 30
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 30

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - stop #5 - Grand Finale - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: Die Freeride World Tour 2023 hat ihr großes Finale in Xtreme Verbier, Schweiz - wie immer mit den besten Freeridern aus aller Welt!

programme.title: Natural Selection Tour 2022 - Women - Alaska, USA
programme.desc: The Natural Selection Tour 2022 features the world’s greatest men and women snowboarders competing on the planet’s most epic terrain in all-time conditions. The Tour’s mission is to inspire people to forge a deeper bond with Mother Nature.

programme.title: Open Faces - Season Highlights
programme.desc: Today we present you the Highlights of the Open Faces Event, the chance for riders to qualify for the well-known Freeride World Tour. Junior riders as well as adults have the opportunity to show their skill to the judges.

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2022
programme.desc: Neusiedl am See, (AUT), April 27th to May 1st, 2022With 9 events on the calendar across Europe and South America, it is getting excited for Europe’s and America’s best freestyle windsurfing action!

programme.title: V8 Superboats Championship Round 4 + 5
programme.desc: In today´s episode we go Down Under to the extrem water athletes in Australia. We´re oing to find out, who will win the Round 4 and 5 of the V8 Superboats Championship 2021.

programme.title: E-Bike World Tour 2024
programme.desc: The Verbier E-Bike Festival, held in Verbier, Switzerland, from August 14-18, 2024, is Europe's premier e-mountain biking event, attracting thousands of participants and spectators. In its sixth edition, the festival features a diverse range of activities.

programme.title: Motosurf World Championship 2024
programme.desc: MotoSurf World Championship in Croatia: This year, when the championship hosted the qualification for the World Games as part of the Championship, 109 racers representing 21 different countries and 3 continents competed in Zadar.

programme.title: Desert Dash Namibia 2024
programme.desc: The Desert Dash 2024 is an exhilarating mountain biking event that challenges riders to conquer the breathtaking terrain of the Namib Desert. Spanning over 24 hours, participants embark on a grueling 369-kilometer journey.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 7, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria hosts the next stage of the SCL. Current leader in the World Series is Matjaz Belsak, youngest competitor and strongest man of Slovenia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 8, England
programme.desc: The competitors battle it out in the special event, the Atlas Steel Stone. This stone is made completely from iron and cannot be touched with any support.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 9, Finland
programme.desc: This stage sees the strongmen visit Vaasa, Finland. Residents here are familiar with the competition because some of the SCL icons are from their country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 10, Finland - World championship under 105 kilograms
programme.desc: 38 athletes compete in the under 90kg and under 105kg SCL World Championships. From each weight class, the top 12 qualify for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 11, Romania Part 1
programme.desc: A two day, seven event battle with lots of spectators.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 12, Romania Part 2
programme.desc: Alex Moonen is leading. Part two of the competition in Romania showcases a new challenge - Hercules Hold.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 13, Curacao
programme.desc: In this stage in Curacao no one wants to lose the chance to fight for one kilo gold in World grand finals in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 14, Portugal
programme.desc: The last chance to qualify for the World Grand Finale. Zageris and Belsak fight for the better position for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 15, Dubai World grand finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We reach Dubai where we will crown the new champion for SCL 2016. This is part one of the world finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 16, Dubai World grand finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this last episode, the best athletes compete in Pole Push, Deadlift, Forward Hold and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: We are in beautiful Norway for the kick off of the 2017 MLO Strongman Champions League season. With partly cloudy weather and lots of snow, we have the perfect scenery for the athletes, who prepare for the first contest of the year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: A definite highlight in this FIBO edition in Germany, Strongman Champions League introduced its new rules for a special team item. Graham Hicks tries here to set a New World Record on the biggest log in the world, currently held by Krzysztof Radzikowski. Boosted also by the presence of the acclaimed in the strongman circles names of Mark Felix and Danis Zageris.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 3, Lithuania
programme.desc: This weekend sees the Strongman Champions League Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. Big lifting names such as Graham Hicks , Vidas Blekaitis and Vytatus Lalas are in the startlist to push some big numbers.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: The battle of the Dutch will take place this edition in Lichtenvoorde, a place very well known in Holland because of the famous “Black Cross”. The athletes will compete over six heavy events and the winner gets 25 Strongman Champions League ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 5, Serbia
programme.desc: Set in the beautiful mountain resort Zlatibor, the fifth stage of the Strongman Champions League 2017 sees 14 athletes from across the world competing for the gold medal of SCL Serbia 2017. The event welcomes top-athlete - and odds-on favourite - Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia), who has presented himself in an impressive shape so far. Can his opponents defeat him?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 6, Canada (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next two stages take place in Quebec. With eight events over two days, SCL Canada is a true ‘heavyweight’. The athletes compete in: Truck Pull, Deadlift with cars, Log Lift, and the Atlas Stones. The World’s Strongest Viking Jean-Francois Caron from Canada is a favourite, as well as current SCL leader Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and promising underdog Jimmy Paquet (Canada).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 7, Canada (Part 2)
programme.desc: Welcome to the second day in Quebec. The athletes are fighting hard to win this two-day event. The last points of this SCL stage can be won over four outstanding disciplines: Power Stairs, Dumbbell Press, Keg Toss, and finally, the legendary Farmer’s Walk. Who will leave Canada with the yellow ‘Leader Shirt’?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: The fight for the Finnish trophy continues. In this unmissable SCL event, the strongmen battle for the win in the Carry and Drag, the Forward Hold, Deadlifting with Cars and the Loading Race. Belsak, Radzikowski and Zageris look good after the first day, but the others haven’t given up yet.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 10, Finland Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: This under 105kg category event is the ultimate preparation for up-and-coming strongman athletes before entering the heavy class. The Lightweight World Championship is a special every year in the SCL calendar as it sees new talents rise and many promising athletes who are gearing up for future tournaments. A total of 25 athletes from 16 different countries make their way to Kokkola, Finland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 11, Romania
programme.desc: Situated in the very heart of the Carpathian Mountains, Sibiu is a Romanian town where the climate is pleasantly mild, offering some of the best weather conditions for a strongman event around Europe. All this, without doubt, set the mood for the high results and showtime vibes in Stage 11 of Strongman Champions League. The competition in Sibiu was organized in six different disciplines

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 12, Curacao
programme.desc: From now on every stage of these series will be more than crucial. Curacao is a beautiful Dutch island in the Caribbean, with a great atmosphere to hold another stage of the MLO Strongman Champions League. Let’s see who takes the title here and who will secure a place in the next stage.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 13, Jordan
programme.desc: Ten of the world’s strongest men gathered in Amman to compete in Jordan’s first-ever Truck-Pull Championship. The contestants race against the clock while pulling a 21-ton truck across the track. One of the most fierce competitors to take part in the event was four-time winner of the World’s Strongest Man competition, Brian Shaw.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 14, Greece
programme.desc: Taking place in Corinth, Greece, considered by many the cradle of the sports competition games, an epic strongman battle will mark the last stage before the upcoming big two-day season’s finale in Chetumal, Mexico. In front of more than 5000 spectators, the twelve athletes compete in Log Lifts, Card Deadlift, Conan’s Wheel and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E15 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 15, Mexico World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first day of the two-part finale sees the strongest men competing in Carry and Drag, Dumbbell Lift and the Truck Pull. Everything is possible in this heated fight for the crown against the backdrop of stunning Chetumal, Mexico.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E16 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 16, Mexico World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: On the second day of the grand finale of the 2017 Strongman Champions League, the athletes have a last chance to secure the medals in the spectacular four events Weight for Height, Deadlift Cars, Forward Hold and The Loading Medley. Be prepared for stunning performances – and even world records!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 1, Norway - World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: Season 2018 begins with 14 strongest men in the world, all competing for the title. The competition kicks off in Norway. We’ll see typical Viking disciplines, team events and world records in heavy conditions in the land of snow and ice. They will suffer, they will freeze and fight in this first competition of the year for the title that they will carry on their shoulders throughout whole year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 2, Germany - FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capichampions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2018 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 3, Abu Dhabi
programme.desc: For the first time in history, Strongman Champions League will set up competition in Abu Dhabi. The line-up of super athletes, who are part of the SCL, includes former world champions Dainis Zageris (Latvia) & Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland), current world champion Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and biggest strongman in the World Sean O’Hagan (Ireland).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Strongman classic in land where there is no place for anything else excepts strength, fight and endurance. Here are fourteen of the strongest men, fighting for the title of strongest in Holland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: We go back to Holland, where former champion Dainis Zageris is in leading position after the first three events. Alongside Radzikowski, he is in this moment favorite for world title, and also leader shirt holder.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 6, Finland
programme.desc: Stage six of Strongman champions league, 2018 is set back on north, in Finland. Here we have Matjaz Belsak, wearing SCL leader shirt, one of the biggest strongman in the World Mika Torro, fan favorite strongman in all over the World – Will Baggott, and also big name from Baltic – Aivars Smaukstelis

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: Twelve strongman, including defending Worldchampion Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia , will compete on “Air spa” for the title of best in homeland country of Tesla, Pupin, Novak Djokovic. Matjaz Belsak is the SCL leader in this competition, chasing his third victory this season.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 8, Finland - U105 (Part 1)
programme.desc: The World championship in lightweights of the Strongman Champions League bring to us 50 strongmen from all over the world. All athletes are under 105 kilograms and for them this is the step up to the ultimate heavyweights.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 9, Finland - U105 (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this second stage of the World championship of lightweights we will find out who out of the 12 athletes will win the title in the under 105 kilogram category.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 10, Romania (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of SCL Romania 2018 will be hosted in Brasov. This episode features a new event for Strongman Champion League: “ The Chopper Pull”!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E11 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 11, Romania (Part 2)
programme.desc: After three classical Strongman events – Dead lift, Loading and Front hold – and one historical, Chopper Pull for the first time in history of Strongman, now we go to find out who will take title in Romania. This is the second stage in Romania and it remains to be seen who will win the title; Aivars, Travis or Krzyzstof?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 12, Curacao (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next destination of Strongman Champions League is in a piece of paradise on earth – Curacao. We bring to you some special Strongman events like the Rock Lift, Tug of War and Weight for Height in this episode.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E13 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 13, Curacao (Part 2)
programme.desc: This is the last competition before the grand finals. After the first three events Zageris is in top place, but can O’Hagan, Baggott, Petursson and Ortmayer step into the final? Last chance some of them will find through events like Forward Hold, Truck Pull, Dead Lift and loading very big objects.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E14 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 14, Road to Mexico
programme.desc: We bring you 50 minutes of Strongman inside. Fears, inspiration, courage, the best and worst from our finalists and their expectation of the finals. We also go to Poland and Germany to represent one day in the training of Krzysztof Radzikowski and Dennis Kohlruss. See all the finalists for Mexico in their comfort zone here, with their backgrounds /motivations /family and friends.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 15, Mexico - World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of the Strongman Champions League 2018 finals in Mexico. The last twelve athletes all pushing their boundaries and testing their limits to take the World title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E16 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 16, Mexico - World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: After 11 months and 14 competitions all over the world, it all comes down to the final in this episode. The strongmen must show their best skills and every mistake is expensive, so their concentration must be at the highest possible level. Will Krzysztof manage to take off back or will Dainis maintain his lead?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 1, World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: This year 14 athletes from all over the world came to Fefor to compete in 6 cruel events. We'll see typical Viking disciplines on very heavy conditions in land of snow and ice, World records and athletes like the title defender Krzysztof Radzikowski, strongest guys from Holland and Germany and many more

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 SCL S6 Ep2 FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capita in the World and of course, the most powerful host in Strongman champions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2019 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 3, Turkey
programme.desc: On a spectacular beach in Alanya, the MLO Strongman Champions League Turkey was viewed by thousands of spectators over a two day battle. With 12 athletes at the start over 6 cruel events, like Marble Stone Lift, Truckpull and Deadlift cars. And with the comeback of Travis Ortmayer / USA, former stone king and world ranked competitor. Winner of several SCL stages in the past.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Four times Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter competing here in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, and 3 in this episode: The first event, a truckpull of 17.000 kg over 25 meters in max 75 seconds, was a real hard pull Also for the World Champion Truckpull, Holland’s runner-up Kelvin de Ruiter, but watch his amazing technique here.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter, competing in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, 3 in this second episode; a Viking-press of 150 kg with the current world record holder Luke Herrick. The fifth event, a front hold of 25 kg is loved or hated by the athletes and lastly, the Stones of Strength.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 6, Russia
programme.desc: An unbelievable TANK PULL of 50.000 kg was at the stage of SCL RUSSIA. Never seen this before! Not only a tank pull was done here but also the Viking Press/ Deadlift Max and Log lift reps were spectacular events to see here in Russia. With Mikhail Koklyaev also as event presenter, the former top 3 world strongest man from Russia was there

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E07 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: In this year’s edition on The Balkan Peninsula, we have competing the new talent from Estonia Marko Remlik together with Sebastian Kurek from Poland and yellow leader Kelvin de Ruiter

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E08 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland and Aivars Smaukstelis from Latvia are the strongman future of these days. Mateusz is the best man in the World at the moment to defeat. Only 25 years and such a fantastic strongman. They come here only for a win. But there are 12 more Strong athletes in this episode who want the title of Finland as well.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E09 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Mateusz Is leading after day 1 (previous episode) with close behind him Aivars Smaukstelis and Zake Muluzi from the UK. All very exciting! 5 events in this episode: Log Lift, Fram Walk, Deadlift, Sack Throw (Weight for Height), Loading medley.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E10 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 10, Portugal
programme.desc: In this stage we have a new strong debutant: Oleg Sylka from the Ukraine. He is the new talent, who will stand up against the old champions like ZSydrunas Savickas and Brian Shaw and the Stoltman Brother from the UK. This new talent Oleg is a great character and we will see him flame in the episode in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E11 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 11, Callio
programme.desc: In Callio is the deepest mine of Europe/ 1500 meter deep, whereas the MLO Strongman Champions League also did 1 event. The Forward Hold, on a 1500 dept/ also a kind of new record/ as it was never done before. Spectacular and new in Strongman sport.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E12 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 12, Ukraine
programme.desc: Kelvin de Ruiter is here to defend his SCL World Truck Pull Championships title. But this year, another strong field wants his title. Over 3 different pulls with 3 different trucks, and 14 athletes at the start, it will be difficult for everybody.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E13 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 13, Caribbean
programme.desc: SCL edition Curacao 2019 was a great event, twelve power boys from all over made a great show at the white beaches, and 35 degrees Celsius heat in the Carrabean Islands. Two events were held on Friday at the beach of beautiful resort Sunscape, the other three were held near the world famous floating bridge at Willemstad on Saturday night.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E14 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 14, Dubai
programme.desc: Hosted at Meydan Grandstand in Dubai, the Strongman Champions League had some really big names in the list like Mateusz Kieliszkowski from Poland, Brian Shaw from the USA and Krzysztof Radzikowski. In front of the Burj Khalifa the athletes do the deadlift max and 4 other heavy events at another spot in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E15 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 15, World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: With new places on the calendar, over 16 stages, broadcasting in over 100 countries and in its 13th year, the MLO Strongman Champions League (SCL) can be seen truly as the biggest strongman league in the world. The last stage over 2 episodes of the MLO Strongman Champions League, were held in Porto, Portugal. This competition in Portugal is full of memorable performances and strong results.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E16 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: With new places on the calendar, over 16 stages, broadcasting in over 100 countries and in its 13th year, the MLO Strongman Champions League (SCL) can be seen truly as the biggest strongman league in the world. This competition in Portugal is full of memorable performances and strong results and this is the final!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E01 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: The spectacular Fefor Arena hosted for the 8th time the Worlds Strongest Viking, part of the SCL World Series. But with the absence of former title holders its anyones game. Again, a very spectacular episode of the Strongman Champions League here in Norway.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E02 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 2, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: In this episode, the Titan, former double World champion from Latvia will compete against his fellow countryman and the current World champion - Aivars Smaukstelis. With 8 events over 2 stages the contestants are pushed to their limits in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 3, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: Dainis Zageris and Aivars Smaukstelis, both from Latvia have a serious, strong battle in the this second and final episode of the SCL Finland 2020. Watch the unbelievable and brute power of these athletes in the last 4 events to crown the winner.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 4, World Record Breakers
programme.desc: The SCL Germany event takes place in an ancient castle called Die Burg in the heart of Germany. Its here where 5 world record attempts take place across 5 different events with 10 athletes. They will go to the max! See this and much more in the SCL Germany 2020.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 5, Strongest Viking
programme.desc: SCL Norway is normally all about snow, wind, and cold weather. Our brave athletes are used to compete under conditions few other athletes have competed in, but after COVID delays the competition has been moved from winter to summer bringing in a whole new range of challenges. With an impressive athlete list who will be the winner across 5 cruel events?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 6, World Strongest Team 1
programme.desc: Were in sunny Finland for the next stage of a double-bill of SCL action, but this time its a team event. A truly fantastic event with 6000 spectators. Even during COVID times this was exceptional! 8 Strong Teams where fighting for the title over a crazy 9 events.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 7, World Strongest Team 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland, done over 9 cruel events. In this episode the last and final 5 events take place. 8 Strong Teams are fighting for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 8, Portugal
programme.desc: The next set of challenges are set in sunny Esposende in Portugal. With stars such as Travis Ortmayer, Kelvin de Ruiter from Holland, and Ervin Toots from Estonia. While Fabio Silva will defend the honour in his own country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E09 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 9, World Records (Part 1)
programme.desc: We are back in Germany, with the world record breakers. We promise you this is going to be amazing. Do not move from that seat, because we are going to see some records smashed today. Over 6 cruel events, you will see who gets crowned of the King Of The Castle!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E10 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 10, World Records (Part 2)
programme.desc: With the next episode of Strongman Champions League Germany. Its the world record breakers, and in the last show we set two new records. Can more be records be broken before the king of the castle is crowned?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E11 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 11, Worlds 105 Kg (Part 1)
programme.desc: Welcome to Kokkola in Finland. This city will be the setting for the Lightweight World championship. Out of 24 athletes, only 16 will make it through to the final day, but who will champion each event and who is going to be eliminated?

programme.sub-title: S01 : E79 K1 WGP 2007 Seoul - Final 16
programme.desc: Final Elimination tournament for the top sixteen Heavyweigh fighters. The winners qualified for the K-1 World GP 2007 Final.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 36 SuperFight Series is headlined by Congolese-German light heavyweight Danyo Ilunga throwing down with the Netherlands' Michael Duut. Armenian-Belgian power puncher Harut Grigorian battles 23-year-old German prospect Danijel Solaja at welterweight in the can't miss co-headline bout. Plus two Super Bantamweight Grand Prix bouts. Muay Thai champion and MMA star Tiffany van Soest meets Canadian challenger Jessica Gladstone in one semifinal match-up, while 21-year-old Dutch prospect Isis Verbeek takes on undefeated Amel Dehby of France. The winners of each semifinal match-up will advance to the Grand Prix tournament final – the opening bout of GLORY: COLLISION.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Hacked
programme.desc: Vivek is a man who troubles girls by hacking their phones and laptop computers. This leads to Sameera losing her job. Sameera and Rohan decide to teach Vivek a lesson, but Sameera ends up murdering Vivek. However, Vivek's hacking skills save Sameera from the clutches of law.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E30 Jodha Akbar S3 E30
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E242 King of Hearts S1 E242
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E242 Second Chances S1 E242
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E36 Jodha Akbar S3 E36
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E242 This is Fate S1 E242
programme.desc: Arjun spends time with Preeta and the Aroras. When he returns home, Anjali overhears him confessing his feelings for Preeta alone in the car.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Przeklęte Rewolwery z Dallas

programme.title: Strzelaj Gringo... Strzelaj!
programme.desc: Meksykański właściciel ziemski Gutierrez oferuje uratowanie zbiegłego banity Chada Starka przed powieszeniem, jeśli Stark zgodzi się odnaleźć i zwrócić zbiegłego syna Gutierreza, Fidela. Stark wkrótce odnajduje Fidela, który przyłączył się do bandy banitów prowadzonej przez byłego znajomego Starka, Charliego Doneghana, nazywającego siebie teraz "Majorem".

programme.title: Dolina Zemsty

programme.title: Spóźniona zemsta
programme.desc: Chłopiec z Dzikiego Zachodu, nawiedzany wspomnieniami masakry rodziny, dorasta z pragnieniem zemsty. Zakochuje się w przybranej siostrze, walczy z zakazanym uczuciem, wrogością brata i groźbą śmierci ze strony członka rodziny.

programme.title: Trzy Dolary Ołowiu
programme.desc: Rudy wraca do domu, by zemścić się za śmierć ojca, którego zabili miejscowi bandyci.

programme.title: Wyoming
programme.desc: Charles Alderson i żona osiedlają się w Wyoming. Po śmierci żony Alderson wysyła córkę Karen do Europy na naukę. Gdy wraca, odkrywa spór o ziemię. Miłość, zdrada i przemoc eskalują konflikt, gdy przestępca udaje obrońcę, a Alderson wynajmuje bandytów.

programme.title: Na samotnej drodze
programme.desc: Weteran Johnny Rush wraca do domu, by odkryć, że jego ranczo zostało skonfiskowane przez barona bydła. Dowiaduje się, że jego dziewczyna jest zaręczona z baronem, aby ratować finansowo zagrożone ranczo jej ojca. Po utracie ręki w walce z poplecznikami barona, Rush zaczyna używać łuku, by pomścić swoje straty.

programme.title: Śmierć Nie Dba o Czas
programme.desc: Meksykański chłop eksmitowany ze swojej ziemi staje się rozwścieczonym banitą. W końcu zostaje aresztowany i trafia do więzienia.

programme.title: Django i Sartana: Przeklęty poranek
programme.desc: Ciche miasteczko Black City żyje w strachu przed bandą Buda Willera. Młody szeryf Jack Ronson chce to zmienić. W walce o sprawiedliwość wspiera go milczący, ale skuteczny łowca nagród – Django.

programme.title: Nieznajomy na koniu
programme.desc: Sędzia Rick Thorne próbuje wymierzyć sprawiedliwość w miasteczku rządzonym przez potężnego ranczera. Aresztuje jego syna za morderstwo i rusza w niebezpieczną podróż, by zapewnić uczciwy proces. Czy uda mu się pokonać korupcję i zyskać zaufanie Amy Lee?

programme.title: Zwali go King
programme.desc: Łowca nagród tropi bezwzględny gang handlarzy bronią przez granicę z Meksykiem.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 19, 20, 21
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: El Rojo
programme.desc: Rodzina Sorensonów zostaje zamordowana. Wygląda na to, że przez Indian. Obok miejsca zbrodni wyrasta miasteczko Gold Hill, którym rządzi grupę biznesmenów.

programme.title: Samotna Siódemka
programme.desc: Rodzina z pogranicza przemierza Stany Zjednoczone pociągiem z wagonami, w nadziei na lepsze życie na Terytorium Oregonu.

programme.title: Tequila Joe
programme.desc: Młody zastępca próbuje otrzeźwić i ożywić spłukanego szeryfa-alkoholika, aby rozprawić się z walczącymi ze sobą gangami przestępców na Dzikim Zachodzie.

programme.title: Fuzzy Bohater
programme.desc: Fuzzy i Shoshena przybywają do małego miasteczka Chedron z zamiarem obrabowania lokalnego banku, którego właściciel, De Koven, próbuje przejąć hipoteki wszystkich farmerów w okolicy.

programme.title: Podwójny Judasz
programme.desc: Luke Barret traci pamięć w wyniku urazu głowy, którego doznał podczas strzelaniny. Próbując odnaleźć człowieka, który chciał go zabić, Luk odkryje straszną prawdę o swojej rodzinie, a także, że sam był płatnym rewolwerowcem.

programme.title: Santee
programme.desc: Jody dołącza do ojca, nie wiedząc, że to przestępca. Po osieroceniu przez łowcę nagród Santee, z którym zawiązuje ojcowską więź, przeszłość powraca – gang odpowiedzialny za śmierć Santee próbuje zniszczyć ich nową rodzinę.

programme.title: Pojedynek w Durango
programme.desc: Dan Tomlinson, znany kiedyś jako Will Sabre, próbuje zerwać z przeszłością, ale jego były gang chce go zmusić do powrotu. Po drodze spotyka osieroconego chłopca i zaczyna pracę w banku. Gdy dochodzi do napadu, Dan zostaje oskarżony o współpracę z przestępcami i musi oczyścić swoje imię.

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: Yuma to western z 1971 roku, z Clintem Walkerem w roli głównej, wyreżyserowany przez Teda Posta i nakręcony w Old Tucson. Film był pierwotnie pilotem telewizyjnym, który pojawił się w programie ABC Movie of the Week.

programme.title: Wszyscy Bracia z Zachodu Wspierają Swojego Ojca
programme.desc: Młody poszukiwacz przygód Jakcpot jest właścicielem jednego z pięciu kawałków złotej bryłki, na której wyryte jest położenie kopalni złota. Z piękną damą do towarzystwa Lulu Belle jako wspólniczką, Jackpot rozpoczyna niebezpieczną przygodę, by odnaleźć pozostałe kawałki.

programme.title: Buntowniczka
programme.desc: Ann Shelby, której rodzina jest sprzymierzona z osławionym Williamem Quantrillem, staje się banitką. Ann pragnie zemścić się na Indianinie, który zabił jej brata.

programme.title: Ponad Nienawiścią
programme.desc: Rodzina pionierów zostaje niemal doszczętnie zniszczona przez żądnych zemsty Indian: Mały George został pozostawiony zemdlony na ziemi, a jego mała siostra adoptowana przez indiańskiego wodza. Los sprawi, że znów się połączą.

programme.title: Bóg Jest Moim Coltem
programme.desc: Wysłannik armii działając pod przykrywką ma oczyścić skorumpowane Langford City z meksykańskich bandytów.

programme.title: Dla Przyjaciela Wszystko
programme.desc: Dwóch kowbojów zostaje okradzionych ze złota w skalistych górach i postanawiają walczyć z bandytami. "Anything for a Friend" (1972) to komediowy Italo-Western autorstwa Demofilo Fidaniego, który po raz pierwszy został pokazany przez telewizję w Niemczech.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 22, 23, 24
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Kid, Postrach Zachodu
programme.desc: Andrea Balestri jako Kid Terror O'Hara, przywódca grupy dzieci, które w opuszczonym miasteczku Torque, bawią się w kowbojskie życie.

programme.title: Ślepa Nienawiść
programme.desc: Kiedy w miasteczku zostaje zamordowany indiański wódz, sympatyzujący z nim były szeryf próbuje powstrzymać Indian przed zemstą.

programme.title: Pełzająca Śmierć
programme.desc: Agent federalny Alan Fields, pod przykrywką Jonathana Pinkertona, pracownika Lloyds of London, prowadzi śledztwo w sprawie napadu na bank, w którym jeden z trzech złodziei zabił dwóch pozostałych, aby wejść w posiadanie wszystkich pieniędzy.

programme.title: Viva! Django
programme.desc: Django jest na tropie bandytów, którzy zgwałcili i zabili jego żonę.

programme.title: Kula Dla Generała
programme.desc: Banda meksykańskich handlarzy bronią, zatrudnionych przez rewolucyjnego generała, przyjmuje do swojego gangu Amerykanina, nie wiedząc o jego intencjach.

programme.title: Wyjęte spod prawa
programme.desc: Piękna kobieta porywa młodego lekarza do Lost Valley – miasteczka rządzonego przez kobiety. Mężczyźni mogą tam pracować lub korzystać z saloonu, ale nie mają prawa głosu. Niezależność kobiet jest zagrożona przez gang bandytów i nadchodzące wybory szeryfa.

programme.title: Śmierć nikczemnym!
programme.desc: Dobry samarytanin Benny Hudson i zagubiona Jenny trafiają do kryjówki gangu w opuszczonym mieście. Tam są torturowani, walcząc o przetrwanie w świecie pełnym niebezpieczeństw i zdrad. Czy uda im się ujść z życiem?

programme.title: Próba Miłości
programme.desc: Kiedy Charlotte Sutter zostaje porwana przez Apaczów, jej brat Sam, wspomagany przez starego pijanego poszukiwacza, wyrusza na jej poszukiwanie.

programme.title: Skalpy
programme.desc: Dowódca teksańskiego fortu w czasie wojny secesyjnej odmawia poddania się żołnierzom Unii. Próbuje on kupić córkę wodza miejscowego plemienia Indian. Wódz odmawia, a konfederaci wyrzynają plemię i porywają młodą Indiankę. Dziewczynie udaje się uciec. Ukrywa się u ranczera, który nie lubi Indian, ale jeszcze bardziej nienawidzi konfederatów. Ta dziwna para łączy siły, by dokonać ostatecznej zemsty na południowcach.

programme.title: Porachunki Rewolwerowców
programme.desc: Tajemniczy nieznajomy pojawia się, by dokonać przerażającej zemsty na byłych konfederackich oficerach, którzy podczas wojny secesyjnej zdradzili i byli odpowiedzialni za masakrę swojego oddziału.

programme.title: Masakra w Dragoon Wells
programme.desc: Oficer kawalerii, jedyny ocalały z ataku Indian, wraz z wagonem więźniów przemierza wrogie tereny indiańskie.

programme.title: Łowcy kłopotów
programme.desc: Dwaj skłóceni bracia, którzy nie rozmawiają ze sobą, postanawiają spędzić Boże Narodzenie z matką. Kobieta, mająca nadzieję na ich pojednanie, stara się połączyć rodzinę w ten wyjątkowy czas. Choć ich spotkanie nie jest łatwe, matka nie rezygnuje z próby przywrócenia harmonii i miłości w rodzinie.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 25,26,27
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Pułapka na ośmiornice
programme.desc: Mężczyzna przeżywający załamanie nerwowe odnajduje jedyną rzecz, bez której nie może żyć i zaraz potem ją traci. Nie może przywrócić kobiety, którą kocha, ale może pokryć ziemię krwią swojego wroga.

programme.title: Jej Strona Łóżka
programme.desc: Dwie najlepsze przyjaciółki. Jedna noc. Wszystko się zmienia.

programme.title: Morderstwo Nad Rzeką Wolf
programme.desc: Dwóch najlepszych przyjaciół szuka ucieczki ze świata pełnego niebezpieczeństw.

programme.title: Streamer
programme.desc: Odizolowany młody mężczyzna popada w obsesję na punkcie dziewczyny z kamerki internetowej, która mieszka w jego budynku. Zaprzyjaźnia się z nią, pomimo sprzecznych uczuć.

programme.title: Wiosna w Górach Skalistych
programme.desc: Po rozstaniu z powodu flirtów Dana, Vicky wraca do byłego partnera Victora, a kariera Dana upada. By ją odzyskać, rusza do Canadian Rockies, gdzie Vicky planuje nowe show. Sprawy się komplikują, gdy Dan przypadkowo zatrudnia ekscentryczną sekretarkę, co budzi u Vicky dawne podejrzenia.

programme.title: W Kręgach W Zbożu
programme.desc: W Kręgach W Zbożu. Ukryty świat kręgów w zbożu jest zagrożony, gdy ambitna dziennikarka telewizyjna planuje ujawnić prawdę. Dziennikarka zagłębia się w świat mitologii celtyckiej i UFO, aby odkryć zarówno piękno, jak i niebezpieczeństwo jakie niesie ze sobą prawda, której poszukuje.

programme.title: Omen
programme.desc: Mirę nawiedzają coraz to straszniejsze koszmary. Jej ojciec postanawia wyjechać z córką i swoją ciężarną żoną z dala od miasta na ustronne ranczo w Teksasie. Liczy, że tam rodzina odpocznie.

programme.title: Przemiana
programme.desc: Ben i Naomi zbliżają się do siebie po nieudanym związku i rozbitym małżeństwie. Przekraczają granice i testują swoją przyjaźń.

programme.title: Domek do wynajęcia
programme.desc: Szkocka posiadłość staje się centrum szpiegowskich intryg. Alianci, agenci Nazi i tajemniczy goście rywalizują o wynalazek – niemal doskonały celownik bombowy. Wśród nich ewakuowany chłopiec i zestrzelony pilot RAF-u. Czy ktoś zdradzi? Klasyczna intryga w wersji kolorowej i z polskim lektorem.

programme.title: Rodzinne Strony
programme.desc: Film przedstawia tydzień z życia pozornie przeciętnej rodziny. Harvey za wszelką cenę stara się utrzymać swój nowy biznes na powierzchni w niepewnej sytuacji gospodarczej. Crystal jest pełnoetatową mamą, która trzyma Pearl, ich 10-letnią córkę, w ryzach i zarządza obowiązkami domowymi. Kiedy Josh, kłopotliwy brat Crystal, pojawia się nie mając dokąd pójść, równowaga ich rutyny zostaje zachwiana. Ten niespodziewany dodatek do rodziny rozpoczyna serię wydarzeń, które obnażają ukryte problemy, niedoskonałości i podejrzenia, które zagrażają podstawom ich rodzinnych więzi.

programme.title: Modyfikowane Dusze
programme.desc: Czwórka młodych ludzi zostaje wciągnięta do alternatywnego wymiaru przez portal w szałasie potów.

programme.title: Egzekutor
programme.desc: Bezwzględny zabójca, szkolony na żołnierza Boga przez skorumpowanego księdza, przewartościowuje cel swojego życia gdy uratuje życie małemu chłopcu.

programme.title: Pracodawca
programme.desc: Pięciu wysoko wykwalifikowanych kandydatów odbywa rozmowę kwalifikacyjną o pożądaną pracę. W noc poprzedzającą ostatnią rundę rozmów kwalifikacyjnych, wszyscy zostają porwani i odurzeni narkotykami. Następnego dnia budzą się uwięzieni razem w zamkniętym pokoju bez nadziei na ucieczkę.

programme.title: Pomiędzy Światami
programme.desc: Opowieść o młodym pisarzu, który próbuje pogodzić się z dziewczyną i przetrwać zawiłości nocnego życia stolicy, korzystając jedynie z pomocy swoich imprezujących, dowcipkujących przyjaciół, którzy ciągną go od jednego londyńskiego nocnego lokalu do drugiego.

programme.title: Boże Dopomóż!
programme.desc: W tej komedii o seksualnych skandalach w kościele Rain pojawiają się przerysowane osobowości i chaos.

programme.title: Zerwana Umowa
programme.desc: Kiedy Maxowi, właścicielowi klubu ze striptizem, grożą lokalni gangsterzy, zwraca się on o pomoc do żony. Następnie wynajmuje płatnego zabójcę, by rozwiązać problem raz na zawsze.

programme.title: Miliony
programme.desc: Historia sześciu dwudziestoparoletnich Azjatów: Brandona (Marzyciel), Derona (Czarna Owca), Mary (Tomboy), Charliego (Cynik), Jaya (Playboy) i Eddiego (Mózg).

programme.title: Atrofia
programme.desc: Paranoja to klasyczny kryminał. Ambitny detektyw Ben (James Ray) prowadzi śledztwo w sprawie morderstwa męża najlepszej przyjaciółki swojej żony (Shane Dean).

programme.title: Nadzieja
programme.desc: Młody człowiek sięga dna i nie ma dokąd się zwrócić. Traci wszelką nadzieję, pragnienie i motywację. Dzięki wierze i zaufaniu do Boga powoli buduje się na nowo.

programme.title: Porucznik Albert
programme.desc: W 1944 roku, w niemieckim obozie jenieckim, alianccy więźniowie tworzą atrapę o imieniu Albert, by oszukać strażników. Po kilku nieudanych ucieczkach, porucznik Ainsworth, artysta w cywilu, wymyśla model głowy fikcyjnego więźnia, który pomaga im zmylić strażników i uciec z obozu.

programme.title: Rajska Dolina
programme.desc: Grupa różnych ludzi chowa się w piwnicy uciekając przed śmiertelnymi skutkami ataku nuklearnego.

programme.title: Nadzieja tańczy
programme.desc: Hope Douglas ma marzenie, aby zostać baletnicą. Jej rodzice chcą, żeby jednocześnie trenowała softball i ćwiczyła balet. Kiedy dochodzi do tragedii, Hope musi dokonać trudnego wyboru, który zadecyduje o jej losie. W którą stronę pójdzie?

programme.title: Przyjaciółki, Wroginie i Fajerwerki
programme.desc: Grupa przyjaciółek spotyka się na przyjęciu sylwestrowym. Wracają dawne napięcia i dawne rywalizacje. Noc pogrąża się w chaosie, a iskry i rewelacje lecą jak fajerwerki.

programme.title: Kapitan Battle
programme.desc: Sam Battle podąża śladami swojego pradziadka, super bohatera z II wojny światowej znanego jako CAPTAIN BATTLE, przyjmując eksperymentalny lek podczas pobytu w wojsku.

programme.title: Pieśni chwały
programme.desc: Major Jock Sinclair służy w szkockim pułku górskim od czasów młodości, gdy zaczynał jako dudziarz. W czasie II wojny światowej został tymczasowym dowódcą pułku. Teraz jednostka powraca do Szkocji, a stanowisko dowódcy przejmuje nowy oficer – podpułkownik Basil Barrow. Jock nie potrafi pogodzić się ze zmianą i zaczyna otwarcie rywalizować z nowym dowódcą, wciągając w konflikt córkę, partnerkę oraz pozostałych oficerów.

programme.title: Drugi Raz
programme.desc: Do małego miasteczka Brattleboro w stanie Vermont przybywa tajemnicza dziewczyna, by stworzyć dla siebie nowe życie. Jej przeszłość pozostaje nieznana.

programme.title: Drzwi do Śmierci
programme.desc: Wszystko zaczyna się od anonimowego SMS-a z zaproszeniem na imprezę. Tuzin młodych mężczyzn i kobiet zbiera się, je, pije, imprezuje i spędza czas swojego życia w zniszczonej rezydencji - aż do momentu, gdy nadchodzi czas wyjazdu. Frontowe drzwi się nie otwierają, tylne drzwi również się nie otwierają.

programme.title: Młodzi Poszukiwacze
programme.desc: Akcja filmu rozgrywa się w roku 1893 roku na amerykańskim zachodzie. Marcus O'Rileya (Riley) i jego wspólnik The Magician (Magik) są wolnymi strzelcami wyspecjalizowanymi w odzyskiwaniu ludowych przedmiotów.

programme.title: Wielka Stopa
programme.desc: Pewna rodzina wprowadza się do domku na odludziu tylko po to, by dać się sterroryzować dziwnemu, przerażającemu stworzeniu z lasu.

programme.title: Ben i Ara
programme.desc: Religijne i kulturowe napięcia eskalują, kiedy muzułmanka z Afryki wdaje się w romans z agnostykiem.

programme.title: Wszyscy jesteśmy równi
programme.desc: Zarozumiały, dobrze zapowiadający się prawnik, niechętnie podejmuje się prowadzeni pozwu Archidiecezji Nowego Orleanu za dyskryminację ze względu na płeć. O pomoc prosi go kobieta, która desperacko chce zostać księdzem.

programme.title: CainAbel
programme.desc: W każdej rodzinie jest dobro i zło. Pokolenie, które poświęca się, by uchronić swoją rodzinę przed zniszczeniem, może przekląć i skazać na zagładę obecne i przyszłe pokolenia.
Programista komputerowy staje się coraz bardziej rozczarowany podczas pracy nad projektem mającym na celu replikację ludzkiej inteligencji przy użyciu mapy ludzkiego genomu.

programme.title: Miłość Jest Wrogiem Wielkiej, Głuchej Pustki
programme.desc: Pogrążony w cieniu dwóch dysfunkcyjnych romantycznych związków Hank wkracza w świat depresji przenikającej się z nowymi możliwościami. Kiedy poznaje niejaką Rose, wpadając na nią wiele razy w miejscach publicznych, zaczyna się między nimi romans w sposób, w jaki większość ludzi przeżywa przygodę na jedną noc. Hank walczy o sens życia, jako bezrobotny miłośnik przesypiania całych dni i nieudolny w utrzymaniu funkcjonalnego związku ze swoją byłą narzeczoną, Jill. Dopiero brutalne przebudzenie podczas intymnego wieczoru z Jill sprawia, że świat Hanka całkowicie się załamuje. Kiedy już wydaje się, że nic mu się nie uda, Hank znajduje nowy powód do życia.

programme.title: Rozmyty krąg
programme.desc: Pełnometrażowy, darmowy film w wersji z polskim lektorem - Rozmyty krąg. Film opowiada o kobiecie opłakującej stratę syna po jego zaginięciu dwa lata wcześniej. W pewnym momencie w jej życiu pojawia się tajemniczy mężczyzna z kamerą.

programme.title: Luna: Dusza Wieloryba
programme.desc: Mike Maquinna powraca do swojego rodzinnego miasta Gold River na wyspie Vancouver, aby wziąć udział w pogrzebie swojego ojca, Mowachaht/Muchalaht First Nations Chief Ambrose Maquinna.

programme.title: Szukając łaski
programme.desc: Zmagająca się z trudnościami i na skraju rozpadu rodzina staje przed nowymi wyzwaniami. Wystawią one na próbę ich wiarę w Boga i wiarę w siebie nawzajem.

programme.title: Nieubłagana Sprawiedliwość
programme.desc: Była agentka australijskiego wywiadu Victoria De Vries, wiedzie spokojne życie na przedmieściach Ameryki, gdzie jako samotna matka wychowuje jedyną córkę i prowadzi zajęcia we własnej szkole M.M.A. Kiedy jej córka wyjeżdża na kemping i nie wraca, Victoria jest zmuszona wrócić do akcji.

programme.title: Dzień Prania
programme.desc: W nowoorleańskim całodobowym barze-pralni wybucha dziwaczna bójka pomiędzy bezdomną uliczną artystką, najgorszym w mieście dilerem narkotyków, zdesperowaną piosenkarką i skorumpowanym barmanem.

programme.title: Poza prawem
programme.desc: Komandos Royal Marines Jake O'Neil zmaga się z życiem cywilnym. Gdy jego była dziewczyna Jade prosi o pomoc w sprawie śmierci ojca, zgadza się. Szybko wpada w sieć intryg i morderstw.

programme.title: Ghost Town Gold [The Three Mesquiteers]
programme.desc: CAVALIERS OF THE CACTUS COUNTRY--ALWAYS READY FOR A FIGHT OR A FROLICK! The second entry in what would grow into a wildly popular series of Western Three Mesquiteers B-Movies produced by Republic Pictures, Ghost Town Gold tracks the titular trio as they attempt to recover the gold stolen by a gang in its effort to ruin the bank/mayor who ordered them to leave town. Frequent John Wayne collaborator Joseph Kane adds his signature directorial panache to this rousing shoot-em-up, setting the tone for a film series that was so rampantly successful, it spawned 50 sequels and a host of imitators from rival studios.

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the world's most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Hawk of the Hills
programme.desc: A band of Indians led by the Hawk terrorizes prospectors in a valley. HAWK OF THE HILLS was originally released as a ten episode serial in 1927 but was re-edited into a five-reel feature (the version presented here) in 1929.

programme.title: Mason of the Mounted
programme.desc: Canadian Mountie Mason is sent south of the border to look for a horse thief with only a watch chain for evidence. He befriends young Andy and when Calhoun hits Andy, Mason and Calhoun fight. In the scuffle Calhoun's watch with the missing chain is dislodged. Mason then sets out to bring in Calhoun and his gang.

programme.title: Rawhide Rangers
programme.desc: Blackie's gang is creating havoc and the Ranger, Brand Calhoun and his brother go to investigate.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After the Virginia City bank is robbed by an outlaw gang, the gangs youngest member gets a job on the Ponderosa. Initially welcomed, Little Joe becomes suspicious of Ponderosas newest member.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After a U.S. deputy marshal saves Adam's life from two gunmen, he explains that he is in town to bring a close friend of the Cartwright's to San Francisco to testify in a statewide racketeering trial, but the Deputy Marshal's motives for the witness soon become suspicious.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort. From 1960.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: With Tom Edwards ranch going to waste since his becoming a paraplegic following an accident with Ben, Ben makes a business proposition: The Cartwrights will build a mill on Edwards land. In return, Ben requests that he earn his investment money back as well as fifteen percent. The deal is made, but suspicions of Edwards accident bring tension to Ponderosa and put their agreement at risk.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.desc: Bobbie Jo falls head over heals for an edgy young poet from New York. He likes her, too, but he's not fond of Hooterville. Of coure, Kate has to show Bobby Jo what this pompous fool is all about. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963. Look for Dennis Hopper as the beatnik.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 My Daughter the Doctor
programme.desc: The family wants Billie Jo to become a doctor, but she wants to go to Hollywood to become an actress. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. And be sure to look for Adam West in a pre-Batman role as Doctor Clayton Harris. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in January, 1964.

programme.title: Aces and Eights
programme.desc: Hard-hitting cowboy star Tim McCoy appears as Gentleman Tim Madigan, a legendary card sharp who uses his skills at the gaming table to help a Mexican family keep their ranch. There's plenty of action and intrigue in this modestly budgeted western from Puritan Pictures, capably dished out by prolific director Sam Newfield (The Terror of Tiny Town). For those who take their western action straight, you'll be glad to know there's no singing in this one. It's just Gentleman Tim dealing a death hand in a crooked game!

programme.title: Ridin' On
programme.desc: Sometimes it took nothing less than sheer brutality to bring law and order to the untamed West! In this exciting feature from the glory days of quickie westerns, Tom Tyler plays Tom Roarke, a no-nonsense man of his time who can hit hard with either hand. He finds himself in a feud with Danny O'Neil (Rex Lease), who has been accused of cattle rustling and murder. Yet, Roarke suspects O'Neill might be innocent, and that the entire feud has been a frame job. Now he wants to find the real killer!

programme.title: McLintock
programme.desc: He likes his whiskey hard... His women soft... And his west all to himself! Inspired by Shakespeares The Taming of the Shrew (1594), John Wayne (The Searchers, Stagecoach), Maureen OHara (Miracle on 34th Street, The Parent Trap), and Patrick Wayne (The Searchers, The Alamo) star in this western comedy directed by Andrew V. McLaglen (Gunsmoke, The Wild Geese). George Washington McLintock (John Wayne) is the wealthiest man in his territory who utilizes his power and influence to maintain order between farmers, ranchers, Indians, corrupt government officials, and his own family! McLintock is McNificent!

programme.title: The Outlaw
programme.desc: Billy the Kid, Pat Garrett, and Doc Holliday ride again in Howard Hughes' epic 1943 western, but the character you'll remember most is sultry country vixen Rio McDonald. Hughes' nationwide search for an actress to play Rio resulted in the film debut of Jane Russell, whose natural assets were allegedly helped by a special bra designed by Hughes. When The Outlaw finally received a nationwide release in 1946, its success vindicated Hughes and made Russell a star. As for Hughes' infamous bra, Russell said in her 1988 memoir, I never wore it, and he never knew.

programme.title: The Fighting Westerner
programme.desc: A mining engineer tries to solve the murders of several heirs to a valuable radium mine in this western drama from Paramount Pictures. Stars include Charles Chic Sale, and in one of his early roles, Randolph Scott. This feature, also known as Rocky Mountain Mystery, was directed by Oscar winner Charles Barton, who would go on to direct several popular television shows, including Petticoat Junction and Family Affair...

programme.title: Born to Battle
programme.desc: Cyclone Tom Saunders starts a ruckus in a Chinese laundry and has to go before a judge. Unable to pay his fine, he is bailed out by a local cattle rancher and agrees to do 30 days' work for him. It's not too long before he becomes enmeshed in a war between rustlers and outlaws.

programme.title: Brothers of the West
programme.desc: Tom Tyler plays Tom Wade, a range detective whose brother has been accused of robbery and murder. Wade has only one clue to prove his brothers innocence: a set of unusual tire tracks. This film was directed by Sam Katzman, who later became known as Jungle Sam for his association with a variety of jungle thrillers, and then as a master of all exploitation genres, from teen horror to flying saucer flicks!

programme.title: Brand of the Devil
programme.desc: The Texas Rangers tangle with a band of dangerous rustlers in this two-fisted production from Hollywood's Poverty Row. Starring Dave O'Brien, Kermit Maynard, and Guy Wilkerson, with direction by low-budget ace Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the world's most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Dave Morgan, an honest lawyer, faces off with Carter Holmes, a crooked politician, in a fiery election campaign. Things take a turn for the worse when Holmes attempts to have his opponent killed. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Colorado
programme.desc: Theres trouble out west! Its the Civil War and the Union needs troops back east to defend itself. Roy Rogers stars as Lieutenant Jerry Burke, who is sent to investigate why the returning troops are being stalled in Colorado. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Pauline Moore, and Milburn Stone, this film is action packed with a turn you wont see coming!

programme.title: Way of the West
programme.desc: Government agent Gordon (Hal Taliaferro) goes undercover to investigate an ongoing war between cattlemen and sheepmen. But he soon finds himself framed for murder! This low budget western from the short-lived Empire Pictures is from the golden era of shoot em ups, when audiences knew who the bad guys were, and couldnt wait for the good guys to serve up some just punishment!

programme.title: Lawless Frontier
programme.desc: John Wayne stars in this vintage western about a man avenging the murder of his parents. Other cast members include frequent Wayne sidekick George 'Gabby Hayes', plus Yakima Canutt, Sheila Terry, and Jack Rockwell. This Paul Malvern Production from director Robert N. Bradbury also features Earl Dwire, one of the great B-movie villains, as Zanti, the ruthless bandit who sets the action in motion.

programme.title: Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: The sons of a Colorado cattle baron, one biological and the other adopted, resent one another and fight for control of their father's cattle empire.

programme.title: Adventures of Gallant Bess
programme.desc: Rather than a gorgeous Hollywood starlet, actor Cameron Mitchell (Carousel), playing cowboy Ted Daniels, shares the screen in this film with a magnificent wild horse named Gallant Bess, who he tames, trains and keeps for himself. But after Ted is gravely injured in a fixed rodeo, Bess is stolen away from him and forced to join a cruel traveling carnival in this fast-paced western from director Lew Landers (The Adventures of Rin Tin Tin).

programme.title: Doomed Caravan
programme.desc: Hoppy is enlisted to help protect Jane Travers' next caravan against robbers who have been terrorizing travelers. He comes across a wily pair of thieves who hve their men disguised as soldiers to escort the caravan. Hoppy isn't fooled for a second and busts up their plan with help from the Bar 20 boys. Not to be outdone, the thieves then capture everyone but Hoppy and puts them before a firing squad. Not it's up to Hoppy to rescue his friends singlehandedly. The cast includes William Boyd as Hopalong Cassidy, with Russell Hayden and Andy Clyde as Luky Jenkins and California Jack. For those counting, this was the 32nd of 66 Hopalong Cassidy adventures. They would be edited for syndication...

programme.title: Come on Cowboys
programme.desc: The Mesquiteers are back! This time they're helping out a friend who has been framed for counterfeiting. And one of their pledges is to look after his young daughter. Robert Livingstone, Ray Corrigan, and Max Terhune star in this Republic Pictures feature, bringing all the usual laughs and action you know from the other Mesquiteer films!

programme.title: Fighting Fury
programme.desc: A THRILLING TALE OF REVENGE AND REDEMPTION! Based on the story Triple Cross for Danger by the widely lauded Western author Walter J. Coburn, Fighting Fury is a thrilling take on the Western revenge drama. Portraying both a father and his son, star of silent and sound cowboy adventure films, Jack Hoxie (Trouble Busters, Law and Lawless) exudes the classic American rustic charm that still defines the genre. The film spins the yarn of Clay Hill Jr. (Hoxie), a Spanish-American boy raised by a Mexican servant who vows bloody vengeance on three malicious ranchers after they murder his parents and turn his life upside down. Featuring fine supporting performances from genre heavies Helen Holmes,...

programme.title: Red Ryder: Ride, Ryder, Ride!
programme.desc: Red Ryder encounters bandits trying to hold up the stagecoach carrying the owner of the Devil's Hole newspaper, Libby Brooks and her brother Gerry. Red successfully drives off the attackers but becomes embroiled in further conflict, leading to a duel that nearly claims his life.

programme.title: With Sitting Bull at the Spirit Lake Massacre
programme.desc: A long-thought-lost film finally surfaces after being unseen for over eight decades. Created and copyrighted by Sunset Productions in 1925 but not released until June 15, 1927, this silent epic features the superior Native American actor Chief Yowlachie (performing here under the name Chief Yowlache) as Sitting Bull. Other fine actors in the cast include the always popular Bryant Washburn and a young Bob Steele, who appears under his real name Bob Bradbury Jr. The story takes place in the 1860s or 1870s near Spirit Lake, Iowa. Settlements of whites are growing in that region but the Sioux Indians also have professed their interest in one such settlement. Chief Sitting Bull surveys the...

programme.title: The Two Gun Man
programme.desc: Ken Maynard stars in this vintage western about ranchers under threat from hired gunmen. Director Phil Rosen, whose career dated back to working with Thomas Edison and included several Charlie Chan features, keeps the action hot with help from a strong ensemble, including Charles King, Murdock MacQuarrie, and a horse named Tarzan! Maynard plays Blackie Weed, a marshall going undercover to capture and arrest some cattle rustlers.He finds himself up against some very bad men, and he's soon framed for murder. Watch as Blackie blazes his way to vindication with a .45 in either hand and the flame of righteous anger in his eyes... Kitty: Nita Martin. Joe Kearney: Lafe McKee. Lem Tolliver: Tom...

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are ordered to Wisconsin to investigate an Indian agent's claim that a lumber company is forcing the Chippewa Indians off their reservation in order to harvest pristine stands of pine trees. The G-Men's investigation is hindered by the distrust of the Chippewas as well as the lumbermen. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In this episode, Pat and Stoney are ordered to California to investigate reports of an anthrax epidemic and get involved in murder and a feud between neighboring ranchers. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.desc: Following the murder of a railroad agent, Matt and Frankie work to bring the vengeful Tiburcio Vasquez to justice. Strange was known for playing Frankenstein's monster in several Universal pictures, as well as a recurring role on Gunsmoke. Also, Eddie Parker, who plays a trapper in this episode, was one of Hollywood's most revered stuntmen. Directed by William Witney. Epsiode oringinally aired in 1954.
